rooms.name: Entrance Hallway and Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious area that includes the entrance, a reception area leading into the living room with ample natural light. Designed to be welcoming while respecting Vastu principles by aligning entrances in the north or east direction.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room, this dining area is designed with a view of the garden and incorporates Chettinad-style architectural elements. The dining table is placed centrally to encourage positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A modern kitchen integrated with traditional design elements, ensuring efficient workflow and incorporating adequate natural ventilation. The placement follows Vastu recommendations of facing east or north.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A luxurious master bedroom with an expansive balcony for relaxation and fresh air, following Vastu guidelines for sleep quality. It includes ample storage and a private ensuite.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: A well-appointed bedroom featuring a balcony, designed to maximize light and air circulation. Layout follows Vastu principles ensuring balanced energy distribution.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: A spacious room with access to a private balcony, offering serenity and ample natural light. The placement is optimized for Vastu harmony.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: A comfortable bedroom equipped with a balcony. The design respects local norms and Vastu by ensuring clear pathways for energy flow.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A guest room designed to be versatile, with a balcony that overlooks the garden. Placement follows Vastu guidelines ensuring comfort and positive energy.

rooms.name: Study/Office
rooms.description: A dedicated workspace with natural lighting and ventilation, designed according to both traditional and modern needs. Vastu principles guide its placement to enhance focus.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A well-equipped private gym located on the ground floor with sufficient ventilation and natural light, designed for optimum performance while maintaining privacy. Vastu principles ensure proper alignment of space.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: A compact room housing appliances such as washing machines and storage, arranged to keep the living spaces clutter-free. Placement is in line with Vastu norms.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: A grand entrance that aligns with Vastu principles, inviting positive energy. The door is designed to be robust and aesthetically pleasing.

openings.name: Balcony Openings in Bedrooms
openings.description: Each bedroom has its own balcony opening, ensuring ample light and ventilation while providing an outdoor space for relaxation. The design incorporates traditional Chettinad motifs.

openings.name: Window Openings in Living Areas
openings.description: Strategically placed windows to maximize natural light without compromising privacy, following both Vastu and local building norms.
